resources.string: \nWe here at ACME Dehydrated Water Co have worked hard to apply the wonders of dehydration technology to H2O. A single liter of H2O weighs 1 kg (2.2 lbs), but our patented dehydration technology can reduce its weight to nearly 0 kg. We hope you are as excited as we are, and we hope to see your investment capital rolling in soon!\n

ACME Dehydrated Water Co.
